com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications

Class EventNotificationListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications.NotificationListener
      • com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications.EventNotificationListener

  • public abstract class EventNotificationListener
extends NotificationListener
    This class extends NotificationListener, and gives an easy way to listen and execute code when a specific event type has been processed.
    To do so, call the autoAdd() method or add an instance of this class to the simulator to listen for the appropriate notification code (CoreNotificationCodes.SIMULATOR_EVENT_PROCESSED).
    Since:
    1.0
